meta.description: Determine the number of small and large buses to hire for a school field trip to minimize the total number of buses while meeting student transportation and parking constraints.

sets.name: BUS_TYPES
sets.description: Types of buses available for hire

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of bus

params.name: total_students
params.description: Total number of students needing transportation

params.name: max_large_bus_percentage
params.description: Maximum percentage of buses that can be large

vars.name: num_buses
vars.description: Number of buses to hire of each type

objective.name: min_total_buses
objective.description: Minimize the total number of buses hired

constraints.name: student_transportation_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure enough buses are hired to transport all students

constraints.name: large_bus_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of large buses to 20% of the total buses
